content: quick ombré hat by emily dormier materials 2 different colors of worsted weight yarns 50-100 yards of each notions size us 8/5 0mm 16 inch circular needle size us 8/5 0mm double pointed needles tapestry needle gauge 4 5 stitches = 1 inch abbreviations k - knit p - purl k2tog - knit two together co cast on sizes preemie 4-5lbs premiee 5-6lbs newborn baby 3-6months baby 6-12 months toddler child adult woman adult man in inches 12 4 13 3 14 2 16 17 8 18 7 19 6 21 3 24 in centimeters 31 5 33 8 36 41 45 47 5 49 8 54 1 61 note for smaller sizes hat can be worked entirely on double pointed needles pattern cast on co 56 60 64 72 80 84 88 96 108 stitches in color a join in the round being careful not to twist ribbing *k2 p2* for 4 5 5 6 7 7 8 8 9 rounds in color a body for 56 stitches work chart 1 then knit one round of color b for 60 stitches knit one round of color a next work chart 1 then knit one round of color b for 64 stitches work chart 2 then knit one round of color b for 72 stitches knit two rounds of color a next work chart 2 then knit three rounds of color b for 80 stitches work chart 3 then knit one round of color b for 84 stitches knit one round of color a next work chart 3 then knit two rounds of color b for 88 stitches knit two rounds of color a next work chart 3 then knit three rounds of color b for 96 stitches knit four rounds of color a next work chart 3 then knit five rounds of color b for 108 stitches knit five rounds of color a next work chart 3 then knit six rounds of color chart 3 color a color b chart 2 chart 1 decreases for 84
